page.title: 13RELIGION PART TWO.
page.content: The numbers of people that come to the services vary with the seasons. In the summer holidaymakers come to the church increasing the size of the congregation. Mr. Boultbee became a vicar after he found that he was becoming very active in the church and he had to make a choice between his business and the church.He approached the Bishop and then attended a church college for 3 years. He has some hobbies, for which he has little time.They are sailing and stamp collecting. The sailing he likes best of all. The church in St .Merryn was founded in 1422 A.D. and MR.Boultbee is very proud of it.
